easyStandard.cultist: -1. If you fail and it is your turn, lose all remaining actions and end your turn immediately.
easyStandard.tablet: -2. Add 1 doom token to the nearest Cultist enemy.
easyStandard.elderThing: -3. If you fail, choose and discard a card from your hand.

hardExpert.skull: -X. X is 1 more than the current Agenda #.
hardExpert.cultist: Reveal another token. If you fail and it is your turn, lose all remaining actions and end your turn immediately.
hardExpert.tablet: -4. Add 1 doom token to each Cultist enemy in play.
hardExpert.elderThing: -3. If you fail, choose and discard a card from your hand for each point you failed by.
